${ModID}:MessUp.NAME: Mess Up
${ModID}:MessUp.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to the amount of cards in your draw pile. NL Shuffle your Discard pile into your draw pile.
${ModID}:MessUp.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Shuffle your Discard pile into your deck. NL Deal damage equal to the amount of cards in your draw pile.

${ModID}:SecondStrike.NAME: Second Strike
${ModID}:SecondStrike.DESCRIPTION: Innate. Retain. NL Deal !D! damage. If it is not the first turn, deal !D! damage again.

${ModID}:InstinctiveThinking.NAME: Instinctive Thinking
${ModID}:InstinctiveThinking.DESCRIPTION: Each turn, if the first card you play is Innate, gain !M! Block.

${ModID}:Debut.NAME: Debut
${ModID}:Debut.DESCRIPTION: Once each turn, playing an Innate card Refunds 1.
${ModID}:Debut.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Once each turn, playing an Innate card Refunds 1.

${ModID}:BattlePrep.NAME: Battle Prep
${ModID}:BattlePrep.DESCRIPTION: Choose a card in your hand and permanently give it Innate. Remove this from your deck, permanently.
${ModID}:BattlePrep.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Choose a card in your hand and permanently give it Innate. Remove this from your deck, permanently.

${ModID}:Surge.NAME: Surge
${ModID}:Surge.DESCRIPTION: This turn, your next Innate card is played twice.
${ModID}:Surge.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL This turn, your next Innate card is played twice.

${ModID}:Foreshadow.NAME: Foreshadow
${ModID}:Foreshadow.DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Gain !B! Block. Shuffle copies of other cards you played this turn into your draw pile. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:PlannedDefense.NAME: Planned Defense
${ModID}:PlannedDefense.DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Gain !B! Block. If you played another Innate card this turn, also gain half that much Block next turn.

${ModID}:BreakALeg.NAME: Break a Leg
${ModID}:BreakALeg.DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !${ModID}:m2! Vulnerable. NL Startup: Gain{@@}{!M!|1= [E] |2= [E] [E] |3= [E] [E] [E] |>3= !M! [E] }.

${ModID}:DashIn.NAME: Dash In
${ModID}:DashIn.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Scry !${ModID}:m2!. NL Startup: Draw !M! {@@}{!M!|@=card|>1=cards}.

${ModID}:PlotArmor.NAME: Plot Armor
${ModID}:PlotArmor.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Gains !M! additional Block for each Innate card played this combat. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:Improvise.NAME: Improvise
${ModID}:Improvise.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL If you are holding Innate cards, discard them and your Attacks deal double damage next turn.
${ModID}:Improvise.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Gain !B! Block. If you are holding Innate cards, discard them and your Attacks deal double damage next turn.

${ModID}:Cross.NAME: Cross
${ModID}:Cross.DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Deal !D! damage !M! times. NL Your *Crosses deal damage 1 more time this combat.

${ModID}:Kunzite.NAME: Kunzite
${ModID}:Kunzite.DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Unplayable. Turns into a ${ModID}:Gem when Upgraded.

${ModID}:StartOver.NAME: Start Over
${ModID}:StartOver.DESCRIPTION: Shuffle ALL your cards into your draw pile. NL Draw all Innate cards and trigger ALL Startup effects. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:Starring.NAME: Starring
${ModID}:Starring.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Gain !M! random Innate {@@}{!M!|@=card|>1=cards} of any color.
